description:
Border counters Galopoula`s attack. Multiple battles intensify simultaneously:  Kuroe and Kitora vs. Idras controlled by Yomi. Nasu and Kumagai vs. Wen. Miwa and Yoneya vs. Koskero. And Border`s top four Attackers, including Tachikawa vs. Gattlin and Ratarykov! What will be the outcome of the fierce battles?
Source: crunchyroll
